page.title: 08GOVERNMENT
page.content: The Severnside area is controlled by Bristol City Council together with Northavon District Council and Almondsbury Parish Council. They are responsible for planning and highways, footpaths, burial board, snow wardens and liaison between local industry and Councils. I.C.I. is responsible for the Severn Embankment in this area. HOUSING The greater part of this area is farmland or industrial estates, with no housing. Part of Hallen village contains 10 council houses, 3 bungalows the old school circa l858 turned into a house, two caravan homes and a number of small farmhouses and cottages. There has been no new building in the area for some years.
